description.value:
A Set of grappling hook blades and lines set on motorised arms that allow for a user to effortlessly climb nearby surfaces hands free. Comes in 4 Line and 6 Line Variants. 4 Line allows for Half Movement Speed and can't Run or Charge, 6 Line allows for an Agility Test to move at full speed until coming to a stop, and another to Run or Charge, failiure halts the user, 3+ DoF Fall.

Requirements

4 Line: 10kg, Scarce, 300 Throne Cost 6 Line: 15kg, Rare, 500 Throne Cost

Effect: Scarce

Notes: 300 T
